mapper.select: WITH C AS ( SELECT USER_ID , PRODUCT_ID , SIZE_CODE , CNT FROM CART ) SELECT C.USER_ID AS USER_ID , C.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID , P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME , C.SIZE_CODE AS SIZE_CODE , CODE.CODE_NAME AS SIZE_NAME , IMAGE.IMAGE AS THUMBNAIL , C.CNT AS CNT FROM C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.ID = C.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CODE ON CODE.CODE_GROUP1 = 'SIZE' AND CODE.CODE_GROUP2 = P.CATEGORY_CODE AND CODE.CODE = C.SIZE_CODE INNER JOIN ( SELECT PI1.ID , PI1.SEQ , PI1.IMAGE FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE PI1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID , MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE GROUP BY ID ) PI2 ON PI1.ID = PI2.ID AND PI1.SEQ = PI2.SEQ ) IMAGE ON IMAGE.ID = C.PRODUCT_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.USER_ID = #{P_USER_ID}
